hints.title: Classical Bakry-Émery Criterion
hints.content:
121: :label: thm-bakry-emery-classical
122: 
123: Let $L$ be a diffusion generator on $\mathbb{R}^d$ with invariant measure $\pi$. Define:
124: - **Carré du champ**: $\Gamma(f, f) = \frac{1}{2}(L(f^2) - 2f Lf) = |\nabla f|^2$
125: - **Iterated carré du champ**: $\Gamma_2(f, f) = \frac{1}{2}(L\Gamma(f,f) - 2\Gamma(f, Lf))$
126: 
127: If there exists $\rho > 0$ such that for all smooth $f$:
128: $$
129: \Gamma_2(f, f) \geq \rho \cdot \Gamma(f, f)
130: $$

120: :::{prf:theorem} Classical Bakry-Émery Criterion
121: :label: thm-bakry-emery-classical
122: 
123: Let $L$ be a diffusion generator on $\mathbb{R}^d$ with invariant measure $\pi$. Define:
124: - **Carré du champ**: $\Gamma(f, f) = \frac{1}{2}(L(f^2) - 2f Lf) = |\nabla f|^2$
125: - **Iterated carré du champ**: $\Gamma_2(f, f) = \frac{1}{2}(L\Gamma(f,f) - 2\Gamma(f, Lf))$
126: 
127: If there exists $\rho > 0$ such that for all smooth $f$:
128: $$
129: \Gamma_2(f, f) \geq \rho \cdot \Gamma(f, f)
130: $$
